newsitem.title: CHINA: China health product sales plunge on fakes.
newsitem.headline: China health product sales plunge on fakes.

text.p: Sales of health products in China plunged to 100 billion yuan in 1995 from 300 billion in 1994 because of a proliferation of fakes, the Wen Hui Bao newspaper said on Wednesday.
The newspaper said that the number of firms making health products in China fell to about 1,000 in 1995 from 3,000 in 1994 because of the smaller market.
The large number of fakes was destroying the reputation of many health products such as edible bird's nests and essence of turtle, it said.
Another factor in the market fall was the low quality of most Chinese health products, the newspaper said but gave no more details.
